item.content:encoded:
Play Video
  1. Begin your journey by heading over to finance.lucidia.io. This is your gateway to the world of $LUCID tokens.
  2. On the top right corner of the page, you’ll see the Connect Wallet button. Give that a click and sign in with your preferred wallet. Whether you’re a MetaMask enthusiast or Trust Wallet lover, we’ve got you covered!
  3. Once you’re in, it’s time to make your move. Hit the BUY $LUCID button. Ready to dive into the world of cryptocurrency? Let’s do it!
  4. A pop-up window will appear. Here, you’ll need to choose the network you’ll be buying with. For this guide, we’re going with the Binance Smart Chain. But remember, it’s your choice!
  5. Now, it’s time to decide how many $LUCID tokens you want to purchase. Think big, dream bigger, and type that number in!
  6. Next, select your bonus. Just keep in mind that this bonus will be available one month after the Token Generation Event (TGE).
  7. Here comes a crucial step. You must select the token you plan to buy $LUCID with. You’ve got plenty of options, from ETH, USDT, BNB, USDC, BUSD, MATIC, DAI, to TUSD. And the best part? You can choose between ERC-20 and BEP-20 contracts. It’s all about flexibility and your comfort.
  8. Once you’ve made your selection, hit the Buy button. Follow up with your wallet’s notification window and let’s keep this ball rolling!
  9. Some wallet applications might ask you to re-enter the amount you’re planning to spend. Don’t worry, this is normal! Either type in the amount manually or use the default button to paste the same amount you entered on our dApp.
  10. Now, it’s time to Sign the transaction. This is your digital signature, verifying that it’s really you making the purchase.
  11. After signing, Approve the transaction. Just one more step to secure your $LUCID tokens!
  12. To spice things up, type in your Telegram username. This will grant you an additional 5% bonus for every user you refer to us. Who said there’s no such thing as a free lunch?
  13. Finally, copy your referral link from the bottom of the page. Congrats! You’re all set to start your $LUCID journey and share the excitement with your friends.

item.content:encoded:
In the Lucidia metaverse, users have a variety of opportunities to earn $LUCID tokens, such as through the trade of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), the monetization of their art, skills, or services, the organization of events, or the leasing of virtual real estate. However, in order to enable users to earn tokens while also benefiting the network, the following four major processes have been designed:



Play2Earn Lucidia has formed strategic alliances with industry-leading game development studios such as Cathoen Games, G2Esports, Playhera, and AAA Gaming Studios, amongst others, in order to utilize the Play2Earn platform to develop interactive and insightful gaming experiences. By engaging in games and getting high scores, players have the opportunity to win $LUCID tokens.

 

Learn2Earn

The AI algorithms behind Lucidia’s creation of customised curriculums, which adapt to the users’ learning pace and style, have the potential to completely transform the learning experience. Users purchase courses with $LUCID tokens, and upon successful completion, they receive a return that is greater than the amount they initially spent. Lucidia hopes to entice major corporate players to migrate their training programs on the platform so they can take use of its features.

 

Train2Earn

Users have the opportunity to earn tokens for their participation in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) that is housed within the metaverse. The Train2Earn mechanism provides users with an incentive to devote their time in the development of AI, which helps to cultivate a robust community of AI specialists.

 

Fit2Earn

Lucidia is now offering virtual fitness classes in the metaverse. These programs are brought to you in partnership with 1rebel gym and the best personal trainers. Users are able to track the number of calories they burn using haptic devices such as the Apple Watch, and they can compete with one another on leaderboards to win incentives in the form of $LUCID tokens. The Fit2Earn program offers participants the opportunity to earn incentives while also participating in immersive fitness experiences.

item.content:encoded:
The $LUCID token is the internal currency of the Lucidia metaverse. It is used for all transactions. Here is a detailed list of the different ways the $LUCID token can be used:

 

Gaming

The $LUCID token is used to buy game items, virtual assets, NFT trading, virtual real estate, and do other in-game transactions within the Lucidia ecosystem. This makes it easier for people to play games without having to switch between currencies or payment methods. Users can also use $LUCID tokens to buy access to the game for life or to improve their avatars and profiles. Fans of the Embryo game need $LUCID tokens to feed or change their embryos, making sure that their creatures are unique and strong. $LUCID tokens also let you join tournaments with bigger prize pools.

 

Staking

The staking program in Lucidia gives users rewards for keeping $LUCID tokens in a locked wallet for a certain amount of time. Rewards are given out in the form of $LUCID tokens, so users can buy more tokens and benefit from the growth of the ecosystem. Staking helps keep the network safe and gives users a way to support the platform while making passive income. To get people to stake, they will be offered things like private chats with the development team, access to VIP areas on the map, being put on a whitelist for Lucidia NFT presales, and specific monthly NFTs in exchange for voting rights in the Lucidia DAO system.

 

Marketplace

The idea of the metaverse is deeply woven into Lucidia’s market. All transactions in the Lucidia marketplace will use the $LUCID token to make this integration possible. A gas fee and a small fee paid in $LUCID tokens will also be part of the process of minting.

item.content:encoded:
The main currency in the Lucidia metaverse is the $LUCID token, of which there are a total of 1,000,000,000 (1 billion). At the TGE, tokens will be split between presale, public IDOs, and liquidity. This will make it possible for $LUCID to be traded on DEX and CEXs.

 

Here’s how the last $LUCID tokens will be given out:

 

Public IDOs: 4%; PreSale: 13%; Reserve and Burn: 13%; Liquidity: DEX/CEX: 5% Development: 10% Team: 6% Marketing and Community: 14% Advisors: 4% Rewards and Staking: 5% System: 9% Operation: 12% Treasury: 10%

This allocation has a 12-month cliff because 13% is set aside as a reserve or to be burned if needed to keep the $LUCID value stable. Also, 9% of $LUCID tokens are given to Lucidia users as in-game rewards and rewards for helping the platform grow, such as staking tokens. In contrast, only 4% of $LUCID tokens are available to the public through IDOs. This shows that Lucidia gives users and the community the most importance.

 

The $LUCID token is still being fine-tuned in terms of how it works. The Lucidia team cares as much about cutting-edge technology and entertainment as they do about system stability, and they know how important tokenomics are to the Lucidia metaverse as a whole. So, they won’t say that the tokenomics are done until they are sure that they meet all of the users’ needs.

 

The money earned by spending $LUCID in-game will be split in the following ways:

 

Buy back and burn to help with liquidity: 40%

Marketing: 25%

Prize pool and system of rewards: 25%

Infrastructure: 10%

Referral Program: 5%

This distribution shows that Lucidia is committed to putting users and the community first. Because 40% of earnings are used to buy back and burn LUCID, its value will rise over time.

item.content:encoded:
Players in the cutting-edge, blockchain-based racing game Race NFT can acquire, improve, and exchange a wide variety of one-of-a-kind automobile NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Each vehicle’s worth is established by its performance in races, and can go up or down depending on how well it does. In addition, users can make their own unique and immersive racing experience by designing and customizing their own race tracks.

 

In-game, players can use the $LUCID token to buy automobile NFTs from the game’s marketplace. Several models of the same make and model year have different top speeds, acceleration, and handling. The NFT cars the players have purchased can then be used in races on either player-made or pre-made courses.

 

The top finishers in each race are awarded prizes that can be used to purchase new and improved car NFTs. The vehicle’s performance and resale value will both rise as a result of this. The marketplace allows users to trade vehicle NFTs with one another, creating a secondary market for the tokens and giving users the opportunity to profit from their initial investment.

 

Highlights on the technical side include Race NFT’s use of a decentralized blockchain, which provides a safe and open environment for NFTs and the game’s economy. For lightning-quick action, the game makes use of both on-chain and off-chain mechanisms. Racing NFT’s Unreal Engine 5 development ensures a smooth gameplay experience across all platforms.

 

In addition to racing their NFT cars, users may also employ in-game resources to construct and modify their own unique racetrack. These one-of-a-kind courses can be raced on or shared with other players, making racing more of a social activity. The track-building mode lets players show off their artistic and aesthetic abilities, increasing the game’s intensity.

 

In sum, Race NFT provides a fresh take on the racing genre while also showcasing the cutting-edge technology of NFTs and blockchain. Race NFT is destined to become a fan favorite among gamers thanks to its exciting gameplay, one-of-a-kind customization choices, and the ability to make and share tracks.
